parameters.description: {@link LanguageData} value of language data to create.
parameters.name: _language

operations.notes:
Creates a new Language data object. This includes the name of the language, country, and display name.

This operation requires a Language Data value.

This operation returns a Language Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Duplicate Language

If the name of the Language value provided is already present in the System, the following exception is returned:

Duplicate Exception if the Language name already exists.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.summary: Get Language By Language And Country
operations.notes:
Get the language bundle by the given language and country values. The language bundle must be defined for the current Application Account. This operation requires the following arguments:

NameDescription
country String name of the country associated with the language bundle.
language String name of the language to retrieve.
Note: Only those language bundles defined for and associated with the current Application's Account will be returned. See Application Login for more information.

This operation returns a Language Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Language Not Found

If the Language Bundle cannot be found for the given SYSID value, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Language Bundle cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the language to retrieve.
parameters.name: sysidLanguage

operations.notes:
Get the language bundle for the given language ID, and with the Account associated with the application authentication token.

Note: Only those language bundles defined for and associated with the current Application's Account will be returned. See Application Login for more information.

This operation returns a Language Bundle value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Language Not Found

If the Language Bundle cannot be found for the given SYSID value, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Language Bundle cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates language tags from the given language bundle update. Language tags are defined for the Application with which the User is associated.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_SYSTEM ALWAYS

Note: The user must belong to the Account being added to the Forum or must be a System Administrator.

This operation requires a Language Bundle Update value.

This operation returns a HTTP 200 OK status on success.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Language Not Found

If the Account, Language, or Application cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Account, Language, or Application cannot be found in the System.

Duplicate Tags

If the name of the language tags provided are already present in the System, the following exception is returned:

Duplicate Exception if the Language Tag name already exists.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates the Value portion of existing language tags from the given language bundle update. Language tags are defined for the Application with which the User is associated.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_SYSTEM ALWAYS

Note: The user must belong to the Account being added to the Forum or must be a System Administrator.

This operation requires a Language Bundle Update value.

This operation returns a HTTP 200 OK status on success.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Language Not Found

If the Account, Language, or Application cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Account, Language, or Application cannot be found in the System.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: String name of the Language to retrieve
parameters.name: language

operations.notes:
Get the language bundle for the given language name value.

Note: Only those language bundles defined for and associated with the current Application will be returned. See Application Login for more information.

The Path Parameter for this operation is the String abbreviated name of the Language for which we wish to find the translated language data values. For example, the following is an example of using the English language international abbreviation in the path parameter:

 \/languages\/en

The above call would return the language bundle defined for the English language.

This operation returns a Language Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Language Not Found

If the Language cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Language cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID value of the LanguageData to check for last update time
parameters.name: sysidLanguage

operations.notes:
Retrieves the last time that the language tags for the language identified by the LanguageData Sysid provided in the Path Parameter was last updated in the Agilquest.com System. This allows long-running GUI interfaces to cache language tag values defined in the Agilquest.com System and only retrieve new values when the tags have changed. The change date is returned as an AqDate value.

This operation returns a AQ Date value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Language Not Found

If the Language cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Language cannot be found in the System.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
